column4: Userlevel ??  I think it's like #1 is root, no xserver 3 is with xserver.  They seem to change from distro to distro.  I'm just learning myself.
hit clt-alt-f2, login. run  sudo invoke-rc.d gdm stop. do your nivida stuff. sudo invoke-rc.d gdm to restart X . ctl-alt-f7 to get back to gui, if needed
forgot the start on the end of the last invoke-rc.d gdm start command
hit clt-alt-f2, login. run  sudo invoke-rc.d gdm stop. do your nivida stuff, using sudo. sudo invoke-rc.d gdm start to restart X . ctl-alt-f7 to get back to gui, if needed
